H0.text: As what are the islands previously known as the Danish West Indies now known. British Virgin Islands

H1.text: As what are the islands previously known as the Danish West Indies now known. Puerto Rico

H2.text: As what are the islands previously known as the Danish West Indies now known. Danish Caribbean

H3.text: As what are the islands previously known as the Danish West Indies now known. USVI

A4.text: The islands were sold to the United States in 1917 and have since been an organized, unincorporated United States territory.

A5.text: The U.S. Virgin Islands are organized under the 1954 Revised Organic Act of the Virgin Islands.
